Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: フランツ
Entry.EnglishText: Franz

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: レンパオ
Entry.EnglishText: Lenpao

Entry.JapaneseText: レンパオ
Entry.EnglishText: Lenpao

Entry.JapaneseText: フランツさん！
Entry.EnglishText: Mr. Frantz!

Entry.JapaneseText: おお！ 君たちか。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh! It's you guys.

Entry.JapaneseText: お久しぶりです。 フランツさんは、 どうしてここに？
Entry.EnglishText: It's been a while. What are you doing here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>幻<White>あるところ、小生あり。
Entry.EnglishText: Wherever there is an <Cyan>illusion<White>, so too shall I go.

Entry.JapaneseText: マボロシ!? じゃあ、ここに <Cyan>「世界七大まぼろし」<White>の ひとつがあるっていうの!?
Entry.EnglishText: An illusion?! So this is one of the <Cyan>World's Seven Great Illusions<White>?!

Entry.JapaneseText: いかにも。 ここが<Cyan>幻の庭<White>だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Indeed. Right here is the <Cyan>Garden of Illusions<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>幻の庭<White>って、キョグエンで 探してたヤツだよネ？ ホントにあったんだネ！
Entry.EnglishText: You mean the <Cyan>Garden of Illusions<White> you were looking for around Kyogen? I guess it really exists!

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだ。方々を調べて、 やっとここだとわかった。
Entry.EnglishText: That's right, After searching everywhere, I finally found that this was the place.

Entry.JapaneseText: それで、<Cyan>幻の庭<White>に眠るという 大いなる宝は見つかりましたか？
Entry.EnglishText: Does that mean you've found the treasure that lies in the <Cyan>Garden of Illusions<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ。見つけたとも！
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, I've found it!

Entry.JapaneseText: スゴイよ、フランツさん！ で、大いなる宝って、 どんな宝だったの？
Entry.EnglishText: That's great, Frantz! So, what kind of treasure was that great treasure...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>幻の庭<White>に眠る 大いなる宝とは……
Entry.EnglishText: The treasure that lies in the <Cyan>Garden of Illusions<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: この素晴らしき景観だ！
Entry.EnglishText: Is this wonderful view!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……この景色が……お宝？
Entry.EnglishText: ...The treasure... is the view!

Entry.JapaneseText: そうさ！ 素晴らしいと 思わんかね！
Entry.EnglishText: That's right! Don't you think it's grand?

Entry.JapaneseText: 澄みきった空気…… この建造物の美しさ…… ここに来た者だけが得られる喜び。 それこそが<Yellow>大いなる宝<White>なのだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: The clean air... The beautiful edifice... These delights belong only to those who come here. That's why it's a <Yellow>great treasure.<White>

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか…… 景色が素晴らしいって言われても、 フランツさんみたいには 喜べないんですけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Well... Even though you've called it wonderful, I'm not really enjoying the scenery as much as you are...

Entry.JapaneseText: はっはっはっ…… 大人になればわかるさ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hahaha... When you're an adult, you'll understand!

Entry.JapaneseText: それにしても…… どうやって、 ここまで来たんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: On another note... How'd you get up here?

Entry.JapaneseText: 信じる心があれば、 どんな事だってできるのだよ！ はっはっはっ……
Entry.EnglishText: If you believe with all your heart, you can do anything! Hahaha...

Entry.JapaneseText: はぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: Hah...

Entry.JapaneseText: さて。小生は、次なる冒険へと 旅立つとするか。 それでは諸君、また会おう！
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I'll be off on a new journey now. I'll see you around!

Entry.JapaneseText: フランツさんもお元気で。
Entry.EnglishText: Take care, Mr. Frantz.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……フランツさんって、 スゴイ人だよね。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Frantz, sure is incredible.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺たちもフランツさんに 負けないよう、がんばろう。
Entry.EnglishText: We'll need to do our best so we don't lose out to him.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、信じる心ってヤツを しっかり持ってな！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, we need to keep believing with all our hearts!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
